card.note: Congratulations on your wedding! Wishing you a long and happy marriage!
card.author: Amelia Penko

card.note: Blessed is the man who finds a wife. May the joy of your new home be filled with laughter, smiles, kisses, hugs, respect, understanding and faithfulness. Happy Wedlock /R Hold to the happiness you feel today. /R/R
card.author: Monica Rathi

card.note: Teresa & Don,/R/RCongratulations to two wonderful people. I wish you lots of love, laughter and happiness./RDon, If you are planning on making a movie please make it with little drama and lots of comedy./R/R
card.author: Sue & Roger Johnson

card.note: Teresa & Don,/R/RCongratulations! I wish you two all the best as you start your lives together. Enjoy your special day and this exciting time creating new memories together as husband and wife.
card.author: Victoria Khorsandi

card.note: First and foremost I'm grateful to know both of you and what great people you are./RWishing you both all the happines in marriage and life that you deserve. Cherish this amazing day with family and friends as you start your journey together. /R/R
card.author: Dirk Herdes

card.note: Congratulations!/RWishing you many days of happiness together~
card.author: Moon

card.note: Dear Teresa and Don, /R/RI wish you a Beautiful Wedding Day and a Future filled with Happiness...
card.author: Love, Carmela

card.note: I would like to congratulate you on the auspicious occasion of your marriage. May it heralds a new chapter in your life where all your dreams get fulfilled and you enter into a journey of happiness, prosperity and blissfulness! May you remain as cheerful and jubilant!
card.author: Abhishek Rao

card.note: Dear Teresa and Don, /R/RSo happy for you both!! I wish you all the best at your wedding and then also, in your journey together as husband and wife. You're a *Power* Nielsen couple ;-). It was a pleasure to get to know and work with both of you! /R/RMuch love
card.author: Maria Calvache

card.note: Situation: Don likes Teresa/RComplication: Teresa like Don /RQuestion: Are they dating?/R/RAnswer: Mysterious Unilever meeting where Don shares, /R"I proposed to Teresa." /R"Our Teresa!?!" shouts Kirsten with joy that they found love surrounded by ice cream and shampoo.
card.author: Kirsten Londono

card.note: Congratulations! Wishing you much love and happiness!
card.author: Kristin

card.note: Congrats Teresa and Don!! Wishing you both the absolute very best for your future together./R/REnjoy Hawaii!
card.author: Sean Seger

card.note: I hope your special day is the start of an amazing and exciting life together! I wish you all the best in the many years to come./R/R"Love is the creator of our favorite memories and the foundation of our fondest dreams."
card.author: Paulina Pchelin

card.note: Build your partner up and support them to be all they can or want to be./R/RCongratulations & best wishes for your future together!
card.author: Caitlin

card.note: Congratulations to a very special couple! May you be blessed with a very long life together filled with unending happiness, love and laughter. You two deserve only the best life can offer!
card.author: Theresa Solokas

card.note: Teresa & Don,/R/RCongratulations on your wedding. I wish you many years of joy and happiness. The secret to a great marriage is CEM:/RCuddling/REvolving/RMagical/R/R
card.author: Tony & Jessica (Unilever)

card.note: To two of my favorite people/R/RWishing you both the best as you become husband and wife. /R/RRemember to always take time out for yourselves and to laugh and enjoy your relationship. Don't let the daily life stresses get in the way of that.
card.author: Michele Navarro

card.note: Very exited for both of you! This is such a special time, a new beginning for two lovely people. /R/RAlso, it's always lovely to see Nielsen as a place where couples can find true love. (I mean, who would expect THAT?!?!?)
card.author: All the best, Meghan Palestis

card.note: Don and Teresa, you're great people and a beautiful couple. All my best for a long and happy marriage!
card.author: Will Creamer

card.note: You are two beautiful people,/RNow teamed as a man and a wife./RCongratulations on tying the knot! Take a moment to enjoy all the special memories/Rthat you both will remember for the rest of your lives.
card.author: Sajal Sarkar

card.note: Congratulations Don & Teresa! Wishing you both nothing short of a lifetime of love, happiness, and laughter!
card.author: Gina Carbone

card.note: Congratulations! Wishing you the best for your wedding day and future.
card.author: Noreen Mitchell

card.note: Best wishes on your special day, Don & Teresa! You both deserve to enjoy this very special time. Hope your day is filled with joy & celebration with friends and family. Cheers!
card.author: Emily Smith

card.note: Congratulations Don and Teresa! I wish you a lifetime of happiness.
card.author: Norine Rudnicki

card.note: I think you have what it takes to make the marriage a lifetime. It's about humility and servanthood(both ways!). Love is a verb, it's circular. Rely on the bonds forged in the good times to get you through the bad ones. Don, you can be "right" or "happy" :>) Eph5:22-3
card.author: With Love, Brian Lundin

card.note: Congratulations on your marriage and best wishes always! Hope you have a long and fruitful marriage!
card.author: Jordan Robinson

card.note: Congratulations ! Wishing you all the best and much happiness !
card.author: Kim Saunders

card.note: Don and Teresa--congrats!! I am so happy for you two. You are two of the nicest people I have ever met and I am so excited for you to start your life together. Keep smiling. I wish you many years of love and happiness!!
card.author: Kate Callahan

card.note: Congratulations on your upcoming marriage! /R/RAlthough I have not had the pleasure of meeting you Teresa, I'm 100% confident that you are Don's better half! /RDon, as a man who is married 16 years, my advice to you is 1) listen and 2) always treat your wife like a lady!
card.author: Jeff McIsaac (Unilever)
